Ill defined locative, sometimes over-localized as Ethyopia, Somalia, Djibouti, Horn of Africa, more correctly "frontier" or land of the [Phoenix](Phoenix.html)ians.

According to Homer [Phoenician](Phoenician.html)s came from the Red Sea, thus linking them with Punt.
